Seeing if I set up ox-hugo auto-export correctly. Yep, though it didnâ€™t apply until I reverted / reloaded this Org buffer.

SITE/.dir-locals.el looks like this:

(("content-org/"
  . ((org-mode . ((eval . (org-hugo-auto-export-mode)))))))

Now ox-hugo exports the current subtree every time I save.
